tokenbasedaccess.title: Page Access Tokens
tokenbasedaccess.description: A page access token allows limited access to an unpublished / otherwise secured page via a unique url. Tokens are delivered via email to the selected recipient.
tokenbasedaccess.emailvalidationerror: Please enter a valid email address
tokenbasedaccess.limitvalidationerror: The expiry limit field should be a number
tokenbasedaccess.emailbodyformat: You have been given temporary access to the following page '{0}' on the {1} CMS, which can be accessed using the following link.
